[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /obj/handlers/autodoc/autodoc_html.c

This creates an html document from the generated automatic documentation.

See also:
/obj/handlers/autodoc/autodoc_handler.c

Written by Pinkfish

Started Tue Oct 28 11:39:47 EST 1997

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/config.h and /include/autodoc.h

Method index

create_html_file(object, string)
Writes the data from the autodoc file object out to a file in html format.
create_html_index_file(string *, string, string)
Creates a html index file from the input index information.
create_main_index(mapping, string)
Creates the basic index file which points to all the other index files.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
create_html_file
void create_html_file(object file,
string output)
Writes the data from the autodoc file object out to a file in html format.

Parameters:
file - the autodoc file object
output - the output file to write to
See also:
/obj/handlers/autodoc/autodoc_handler .c
create_html_index_file
void create_html_index_file(string * index,
string letter,
string output)
Creates a html index file from the input index information. This will contain all the functions starting with a certain letter and the corresponding files they are mentioned in.

Parameters:
index - the values in the index
letter - the letter this is an index of
output - the file to write the output to
create_main_index
void create_main_index(mapping chars,
string output_dir)
Creates the basic index file which points to all the other index files... The input letters array is a paired array, the first element is the letter and the second is the file name.

Parameters:
letters - the names of all the other index files
output_dir - the directory to write stuff to
